name: labels
description: Adds labels you can put on bricks
author: voximity

allowAll.description: Whether or not everyone can create labels freely.

auth.description: The list of people who can always create labels, and who can delete others' labels.

banned.description: The list of people who can never create labels.

maxLabels.description: The maximum number of labels a player can make, 0 for unlimited. If they are in the auth list, this does not apply to them.
